reviewText: It's all about the Channel 9 Evening News.  It's almost a patois, and even more like a pidgin language, and by the time you watch a few seasons, you've learned a new language!  Renamed "Brilliant!" when aired on BBC America, this quick sketch comedy show is worth the watch for anyone with a region free player.  Also, try "Brasseye" for more oh-so-wrong laughs.
